name: Drive Heavy Truck In Space
description:
In this game where you can drive heavy cargo truck on massive heights to touch the skies like a legend. driving heavy truck on impossible track is dangerous task for you. you need professional driving skills. If you intrest to Drive Heavy Truck In Space, then this Drive Heavy Truck In Space game is for you.


Drive Heavy Truck In Space: Feature

Interesting mission and challenging levels
Realistic tracks animation and roads
Thrilling sound and background engine sounds
Stunt driving and parking practice
smooth control of truck
